Sure, here's an example of how Challah By the Bay could showcase its product on Instagram or TikTok:

1. Start by creating a short video that showcases the Challah By the Bay product. The video could feature the baking process, from mixing the dough to braiding the challah and baking it to perfection.
2. Use upbeat and catchy music to grab the attention of viewers. You can use music that fits with the brand's personality and target audience.
3. Add captions or text overlays to the video that highlight the unique features of the product. For example, captions could emphasize the homemade and traditional aspects of the challah, or highlight the quality of the ingredients used.
4. Include a call-to-action at the end of the video, such as "Order your own homemade Challah By the Bay today!" or "Follow us for more delicious homemade challah recipes!"
5. Post the video to Instagram or TikTok and use relevant hashtags to make it discoverable by potential customers. Some hashtags to consider include #challah, #homemadechallah, #traditionalbaking, and #Jewishfood.
6. Engage with followers by responding to comments and questions. This helps build a community around the brand and shows potential customers that the business is committed to providing high-quality products and excellent customer service.
7. Consider offering exclusive discounts or promotions for followers who order through social media. This can help incentivize potential customers to try the product and build loyalty with existing customers.

By showcasing the product on social media, Challah By the Bay can build a following of potential customers and generate interest in the product before investing in a professional-looking website. Social media can also be a valuable tool for engaging with customers, building brand awareness, and promoting special offers or promotions.
